article_text:
Add your voice to the discussion. Click on Letters to the Editor to submit a letter or mini editorial to the Journal staff.

We welcome and encourage reader feedback. Letters to the Editor must be no longer than 250 words and will be edited for length. Please include your name, hometown and daytime telephone number for verification. Phone numbers will not be printed.

We will not publish anonymous letters or "open" letters or letters to a third party. We will publish no more than two letters and two Mini Editorials per writer a month. Letters, Mini Editorials and guest opinions may be published or distributed in print, electronic or other forms.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , viola snyder, lake view, iowa, transgender, president obama
article_metadata.author: MICHAEL GORS

og.description: With ISIS occupying 45 percent of Iraq, Obamacare going up 40 percent for the average household, IRS and other government agencies corrupt, and out-of-control border and refugee problems, President Obama
og.title: MINI: 'Distraction and divider'

article_summary:
Letters, Mini Editorials and guest opinions may be published or distributed in print, electronic or other forms.
We will publish no more than two letters and two Mini Editorials per writer a month.
Click on Letters to the Editor to submit a letter or mini editorial to the Journal staff.
We will not publish anonymous letters or "open" letters or letters to a third party.
Letters to the Editor must be no longer than 250 words and will be edited for length.
